lead_paragraph: The case could have broad implications on youth sports if it prompts other families to accuse leagues and organizations of not doing enough to protect their children.

headline.print_headline: Pop Warner Settles Suit Over Player With C.T.E.
headline.main: Pop Warner Settles Lawsuit Over Player Who Had C.T.E.

snippet: The case could have broad implications on youth sports if it prompts other families to accuse leagues and organizations of not doing enough to protect their children.
abstract: Nation's largest youth football league Pop Warner Little Scholars settles lawsuit with family of Joseph Chernach, Pop Warner football player who was found to have chronic traumatic encephalopathy after committing suicide; settlement could trigger other cases against similar leagues, where children are led by inexperienced coaches and receive far less medical supervision than collegiate or professional leagues.
